subject: Baseball
Tropicana Field (St Petersburg, Fla)
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez, who pinch-hit, argued with the umpire after being called out on strikes. His homerless streak is at 38 at-bats.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez, who pinch-hit, argued with the umpire after being called out on strikes. His homerless streak is at 38 at-bats.
